summary.span: This class is a registry encapsulation.

span.span: This class is a registry encapsulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的实例，使用的静态成员之一类。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class. 在注册表的作用好似一台计算机上的操作系统和应用程序信息的中央存储库。The registry acts as a central repository of information for the operating system and the applications on a computer. 注册表组织层次结构格式，基于存储在它的元素的逻辑顺序 (请参阅此层次结构中的基本项)。The registry is organized in a hierarchical format, based on a logical ordering of the elements stored within it (please see for the base-level items in this hierarchy). 当将信息存储在注册表中，选择相应的位置所存储信息的类型。When storing information in the registry, select the appropriate location based on the type of information being stored. 请务必避免破坏其他应用程序创建的因为这可能会导致出现意外的行为，这些应用程序，还可以在自己的应用程序时产生不利影响的信息。Be sure to avoid destroying information created by other applications, because this can cause those applications to exhibit unexpected behavior, and can also have an adverse effect upon your own application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 注册表项是在注册表中，组织的基本单元，并可以在文件资源管理器中的文件夹进行比较。Registry keys are the base unit of organization in the registry, and can be compared to folders in File Explorer. 特定密钥可以有子项，就像一个文件夹可以拥有子文件夹。A particular key can have subkeys, just as a folder can have subfolders. 每个键可以删除，只要用户具有适当权限来执行此操作，并且不是基项或直接下面这些基项的位置。Each key can be deleted, as long as the user has the appropriate permissions to do so, and the key is not a base key or at the level directly under the base keys. 每个密钥还可以有与之关联 （值可以比较到一个文件），用于存储信息的多个值-例如，在计算机上安装的应用程序有关的信息。Each key can also have multiple values associated with it (a value can be compared to a file), which are used to store the information — for example, information about an application installed on the computer. 每个值存储信息，从而可以检索或更新时所需的一个特定的部分。Each value holds one particular piece of information, which can be retrieved or updated when required. 例如，可以创建公司，在下找到密钥 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software，然后一个用于你的公司创建每个应用程序的子项。For instance, you can create a for your company, under the key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software, and then a subkey for each application that your company creates. 每个子项包含的信息特定于该应用程序，如颜色设置、 屏幕位置和大小，或识别文件扩展名。Each subkey holds the information specific to that application, such as color settings, screen location and size, or recognized file extensions. 请注意，存储在注册表中的信息可供其他应用程序和用户，因此不应存储安全数据或关键应用程序信息。Note that information stored in the registry is available to other applications and users, and therefore should not be used to store security data or critical application information. > [!CAUTION] > 不会公开，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式中的对象。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允许调用方可以输入任意键或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，注册表项的长度不再限制为 255 个字符。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the length of a registry key is no longer limited to 255 characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 下创建子项、 操作其内容，并删除的子项。The following code example shows how to create a subkey under HKEY_CURRENT_USER, manipulate its contents, and then delete the subkey. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在系统键上调用此方法不会影响，因为永远不会关闭系统密钥。Calling this method on system keys will have no effect, because system keys are never closed. 此方法不执行任何操作的实例上调用`RegistryKey`已关闭。This method does nothing if you call it on an instance of `RegistryKey` that is already closed. ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个具有指定的访问控制的注册表项`registrySecurity`参数。The method creates a registry key that has the access control specified by the `registrySecurity` parameter. 返回对象表示的注册表项，但该对象不受中指定的访问控制`registrySecurity`参数。The object that is returned represents the registry key, but that object is not restricted by the access control specified in the `registrySecurity` parameter. 如果`permissionCheck`是，为读/写访问打开项。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read/write access. 如果`permissionCheck`是，为读取访问权限打开项。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read access. 为了向后兼容的项打开用于读取和写入如果`permissionCheck`是和父项也有。For backward compatibility, the key is opened for reading and writing if `permissionCheck` is and the parent key also has . 如果父项有任何其他设置，读/写状态是由父项的设置控制。If the parent key has any other setting, read/write status is controlled by the parent key's setting. 若要执行此操作，用户必须具有注册表层次结构中的权限在此级别和更低版本。In order to perform this action, the user must have permissions at this level and below in the registry hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 不会公开，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式中的对象。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允许调用方可以输入任意键或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 若要使用方法，您必须拥有的实例类。In order to use the method, you must have an instance of the class. 若要获取的实例，使用的静态成员之一类。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`throwOnMissingValue`是`false`，没有办法指示如果已成功删除，而无需随后尝试访问刚刚删除的值。If `throwOnMissingValue` is `false`, there is no way to tell if the deletion was successful, without subsequently trying to access the value just deleted. 因此，这种方式在注册表中删除值时要小心。Therefore, use caution when deleting values from the registry in this manner. 在 Windows 95、 Windows 98、 Windows 98 Second Edition 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上，指定空字符串作为`name`参数不会删除默认值。On Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, and Windows Millennium Edition, specifying an empty string for the `name` parameter does not delete the default value.

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: Writes all the attributes of the specified open registry key into the registry.

span.span: Writes all the attributes of the specified open registry key into the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用`Flush`写出对项的更改。It is not necessary to call `Flush` to write out changes to a key. 注册表更改刷新到磁盘时注册表使用其惰性刷新器。Registry changes are flushed to disk when the registry uses its lazy flusher. 惰性刷新会自动地定期系统指定的时间间隔后。Lazy flushing occurs automatically and regularly after a system-specified time interval. 注册表更改也会刷新到磁盘上的系统关闭。Registry changes are also flushed to disk at system shutdown. 与不同，则`Flush`函数将返回仅当所有数据都写入注册表。Unlike , the `Flush` function returns only when all the data has been written to the registry. `Flush`函数还可能写出的部分或所有其他密钥。The `Flush` function might also write out parts of or all of the other keys. 过度调用此函数可以具有负面影响应用程序的性能。Calling this function excessively can have a negative effect on an application's performance. 应用程序应只调用`Flush`如果它必须是绝对某些注册表更改记录到磁盘。An application should only call `Flush` if it must be absolute certain that registry changes are recorded to disk. 一般情况下，`Flush`很少需要使用即使有的话。In general, `Flush` rarely, if ever, need be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以具有不与任何名称相关联的一个值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名的值时，而不是名称将显示字符串"(Default)"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名的值，指定`null`或空字符串 ("") 为`name`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 当方法检索可扩充字符串值 ()，它将展开使用本地环境中的数据的环境字符串。When the method retrieves expandable string values (), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment. 若要从远程计算机上的注册表中检索可扩充字符串值，请使用方法重载来指定不希望扩展的环境字符串。To retrieve expandable string values from the registry on a remote computer, use the method overload to specify that you do not want environment strings expanded. > [!NOTE] > 如果已存储为一个字符串值，该值包含对环境变量的可展开引用 ()，而不是可扩展字符串 ()，不会展开它。If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (), rather than as an expandable string (), does not expand it. 检索通过调用后，可以扩展此类字符串方法。You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 要从中检索数据的建议密钥是使用类而不是方法。The recommended way to retrieve data from the key is to use the class rather than the method. > > 不支持类型为 REG_NONE 或 REG_LINK 中读取的值。 does not support reading values of type REG_NONE or REG_LINK. 在这两种情况下，默认值 (`null`) 返回而不是实际值。In both cases, the default value (`null`) is returned instead of the actual value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试项，并将不同的数据类型的值添加到该密钥。The following code example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 该示例然后读取名称/值对，并将其显示在控制台中，使用方法来检索相应的注册表数据类型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to retrieve the corresponding registry data types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要修改的注册表项的权限，请使用方法来获取对象表示的现有 Windows 访问控制安全性，请修改该对象，以及如何将方法来更新的安全性键。To modify permissions for a registry key, use the method to obtain a object representing the existing Windows access control security, modify that object, and then use the method to update security for the key. > [!CAUTION] > 对象指定的用于`registrySecurity`替换现有的注册表项的安全性。The object specified for `registrySecurity` replaces the existing security for the registry key. 若要添加新用户的权限，请使用方法来获取现有的访问控制安全性，然后再修改它。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing access control security, and then modify it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试项。The following code example creates a test key. 允许当前用户并但拒绝权限和权限。The current user is allowed and rights but denied and rights. 后续尝试操作密钥成功或失败，具体取决于这些权限。Subsequent attempts to manipulate the key succeed or fail depending on these permissions. 删除密钥之前，代码就会暂停。Before the key is deleted, the code pauses. 您可以切换到注册表编辑器并验证使用注册表编辑器中访问该密钥时，应用相同的访问权限。You can switch to the registry editor and verify that the same access rights apply when the key is accessed using the registry editor. (此效果最佳，如果您使用**RunAs**从命令行运行注册表编辑器和示例代码而无需管理员权限的本地用户。(This works best if you use **RunAs** from the command line to run the registry editor and the sample code as a local user without administrator rights. 注册表编辑器中始终允许管理员才能更改权限，即使特定管理员已拒绝这些权限。The registry editor always allows an administrator to change permissions, even if the particular administrator has been denied those rights. 如果已定义一个名为 TestUser，该命令的本地用户`runas /user:TestUser cmd`打开一个命令窗口，可以从其运行注册表编辑器，然后选择示例代码。)If you have defined a local user named TestUser, the command `runas /user:TestUser cmd` opens a command window from which you can run the registry editor and then the sample code.) [!code-cpp[RegistrySecurity101#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RegistrySecurity101/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RegistrySecurity101#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RegistrySecurity101/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RegistrySecurity101#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RegistrySecurity101/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于许多值可以存储在注册表中的每个项，必须使用`name`参数来指定你想要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `name` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以具有不与任何名称相关联的一个值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名的值时，而不是名称将显示字符串"(Default)"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或空字符串 ("") 为`name`。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 若要设置某个项中的值，必须具有写访问权限来打开密钥。In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access. 具有写访问权限打开一个键后，您可以更改任何该注册表项中的名称/值对。After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key. 如果指定`name`不存在的项中创建和关联的值设置为`value`。If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 此重载将 64 位整数存储为字符串 ()。This overload of stores 64-bit integers as strings (). 若要存储为 64 位数字值，请使用重载，指定。To store 64-bit numbers as values, use the overload that specifies . 此重载存储所有字符串值作为，即使它们包含对环境变量可展开的引用。This overload of stores all string values as , even if they contain expandable references to environment variables. 若要保存为可展开的字符串的字符串值 ()，使用重载，指定。To save string values as expandable strings (), use the overload that specifies . 此方法的重载数字类型，而不是 32 位整数存储为字符串。Numeric types other than 32-bit integers are stored as strings by this method overload. 枚举元素存储为包含的元素名称的字符串。Enumeration elements are stored as strings containing the element names. > [!CAUTION] > 不会公开，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式中的对象。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允许调用方可以输入任意键或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上注册表不是 Unicode，而不是所有 Unicode 字符都是有效的所有代码页。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 最佳的匹配项都替换为对当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法确定注册表数据类型时设置值。The following code example shows how the method determines the registry data type when it sets values. 该示例创建一个测试项，并向该项添加不同数据类型的值。The example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 该示例然后读取名称/值对，并将其显示在控制台中，使用方法来显示相应的注册表数据类型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetValue1/VB/source.vb#1)]

you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以具有不与任何名称相关联的一个值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名的值时，而不是名称将显示字符串"(Default)"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名的值，指定`null`或空字符串 ("") 为`name`。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 若要设置某个项中的值，必须具有写访问权限来打开密钥。In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access. 具有写访问权限打开一个键后，您可以更改任何该注册表项中的名称/值对。After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key. 如果指定`name`不存在键，它创建，并且相关联的值设置为`value`。If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created, and the associated value is set to `value`. > [!NOTE] > 指定的注册表数据类型等同于使用重载。Specifying the registry data type is the same as using the overload. 如果指定的类型`value`不匹配指定`valueKind`，且不能为数据转换，引发。If the type of the specified `value` does not match the specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, is thrown. 例如，可以存储作为，但前提是其值小于最大值。For example, you can store a as a , but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a . 不能存储作为单个字符串值。You cannot store a single string value as a . > [!NOTE] > 如果已装箱的值将传递进行或，执行该转换使用固定区域性。If boxed values are passed for or , the conversion is done using the invariant culture. > [!CAUTION] > 不会公开，恶意程序无法创建数千个无意义的子项或键/值对的方式中的对象。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允许调用方可以输入任意键或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上注册表不是 Unicode，而不是所有 Unicode 字符都是有效的所有代码页。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 最佳的匹配项都替换为对当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试项，并使用方法来存储多个值，指定每个值的注册表数据类型。The following code example creates a test key and uses the method to store several values, specifying the registry data type for each value. 该示例然后读取名称/值对，并将其显示在控制台中，使用方法来显示相应的注册表数据类型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值包含指定的密钥和密钥的十六进制值的注册表路径。The return value includes the registry path of the specified key and the hexadecimal value for the key. 注册表路径包含指定键的绝对根，始终从 1 开始的基键的注册表中，例如，HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE。The registry path includes the absolute root of the specified key, always starts at one of the base keys for the registry, for example, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE. ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个注册表项具有未与任何名称关联的默认值。Each registry key has a default value that is not associated with any name. 此未命名的值可以通过设置方法，并指定`null`或空字符串 ("") 为`name`。This unnamed value can be set by using the method and specifying either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 如果将永远不会设置默认值，它不计入返回的总计数属性; 后已设置，但是，它始终计数。If the default value has never been set, it does not contribute to the total count returned by the property; once it has been set, however, it is always counted. ## Examples 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 64 位版本的 Windows，对于 32 位和 64 位应用程序可以单独存储的注册表部分。On the 64-bit versions of Windows, portions of the registry are stored separately for 32-bit and 64-bit applications. 没有 32 位应用程序的 32 位视图和 64 位应用程序的 64 位视图。There is a 32-bit view for 32-bit applications and a 64-bit view for 64-bit applications. 不要假定视图始终对应的实际视图。Do not assume that the view always corresponds to the actual view of the .
